doc.title: Margarita
doc.plot: A documentary, made by debut director _Lise Birk Pedersen_ (qv), and written by _Tommy Bredsted_ (qv). The short portrays a Russian teenager girl, named Margarita, which have been living, in Denmark for 7 years. She writes poems about love, most about sad-love. Her best friend is Ira from Ukraine, which she sometimes hangs out with. She also spends her time sitting at a train station and is drawing, while looking at the many peoples going by. She dreams about which personality hides behind all the human beings. "How've they been doing in their childhood? Are they living a happy or a sad life?"
